text: وَجَعَلُواْ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عِبَٰدُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ إِنَٰثًاۚ أَشَهِدُواْ خَلۡقَهُمۡۚ سَتُكۡتَبُ شَهَٰدَتُهُمۡ وَيُسۡـَٔلُونَ
translation: Ababangikanyamana, barakanagara bakita abamalayika basanzwe ari abaja ba Nyenimpuhwe, abakobwa! Mbega igihe c’iremwa ry’abamalayika, ni ho bari bari ngo babe ivyabona ko baremwe ari abakobwa! Ukwemeza kwabo ivyo, kuzokwandikwa maze bakubazwe ku musi w’izuka;
